events.message: I reported an auto accident that occurred last night when another vehicle collided with my car at the intersection.
The insurance company categorized my claim under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and vehicle details.
An agent was assigned to handle my accident claim and to assist with the next steps and documentation required.
I received official acknowledgment of my auto accident claim from the insurance provider confirming receipt of all initial details.
The agent requested further documents including photos of the vehicle damage and a copy of the police collision report.
I submitted all the requested documents including photos and the police report promptly to ensure smooth processing.
The investigation team began their assessment of the collision circumstances and evaluated the damages reported in my claim.
The investigation concluded with the confirmation that the other party was at fault in the collision and damages are covered.
A settlement proposal was presented including compensation for vehicle repairs and associated expenses.
I provided feedback expressing satisfaction with the timely handling and clear communication throughout the process.
My auto accident claim was officially approved by the insurance company following agreement on the settlement terms.
The payment to cover the repair costs was issued promptly and transferred directly to my bank account without delay.
The claim was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and completion of vehicle repairs.
All records and documents related to my auto accident claim were archived securely for future reference if necessary.
